CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, Spetember 8, 1956, pg. 3 reads: "First Day - Accompanied by their parents and a teacher, Crescent School youngsters eagerly enter school. No more jacks, no more dolls, just "readin', 'ritin', and 'rithmetic.' - Harris Photo
TitMainTitle: Group of women, and children, including several girls wearing plaid skirts and dresses, walking into Crescent School for first day of class
